titleStmt.title: A fair examination of a foul paper, called Observations and reflections, &c. lately published by John Raunce and Leonard Key. Wherein their envy is rebuked, and their folly and falshood laid open, / by Thomas Elwood.
titleStmt.author: Ellwood, Thomas, 1639-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Soule at the Crooked Billet in Holy well-Lane Shore-ditch,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Haverford College Library.

place.placeName: the Crooked Billet in Holy well-Lane Shore-ditch
